page.title: 08BASIN HOWE FARM, BROMPTON
page.content: Where I live is a very intersting place because just over a field there are some{war dikes}which me and my brother sometimes go metal detecting and find old shells.The dikes are just like camels' humps. The land around our farm is good for growing crops on.Our field is good for growing grass because it has {goats}in it.The grass when we first came here was about a foot high then the goats moved in and in a few weeks it was about 4 inchs high.We have a field which we sometimes grow {grass}for {hay }and once we grew carrots and sugarbeet.There is one patch in this field that we grow {comfry}and we made some{comfry ointment} with the comfry and elder leaves.We have a{howe}<an ancient burial mound>, and our own { {ram}for pumping up our water from Troutsdale.
